name: Three Little Pigs VR
description:
Experience the three little pigs like you've never seen them before: in a 360° VR story world! Watch the fun unfold as the pigs build their homes only to meet up with the Big Bad Wolf! Young readers can follow along with onscreen text as the narrator tells the classic tale. Compatible with Google Cardboard and most other mobile VR devices.

#THREEPIGSVR

Features:
* 3D environment featuring beautifully illustrated storybook scenery!
* Follow along the classic tale by viewing key elements of the story!
* Read-Along Tale features narration and written text!
* Whimsical cast of classic characters!

To fully enjoy this app you'll need a Virtual Reality viewer such as a Google Cardboard or View-Master®.
Learn more and get your own Cardboard viewer at http://g.co/cardboard.
